tha-ap405:6.3: sugatapattaṃ → sugatappattaṃ (bj) | sugataṃ pattaṃ (si) | subhakaṃ pattaṃ (pts1)
tha-ap405:6.4: sappitelaṃ apūrayiṃ → sappitelena pūrayiṃ (bj) | sappitelamapūrayiṃ (pts1) | sappitelassa'pūrayiṃ (?)
tha-ap405:10.4: arahattaṃ bhavissati → arahā tvaṃ bhavissasi (bj, pts1) | arahattaṃ gamissati (s2, s3)
tha-ap405:17.2: cajitvā → catvāna (si, mr) | datvāna (s2, s3, pts1)
tha-ap405:22.1: Aho buddhā aho dhammā → aho buddho aho dhammo (bj)
tha-ap405:25.4: upanidhiṃ → upanidhaṃ (si, s2, s3, mr) | upanīyaṃ (pts1)
